task: Using a kidney Xenium dataset that contains only Day 2 PT cells with per-cell spatial centroids (x, y), cluster the cells into 5 subclusters and assign labels using the exact vocabulary: PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj_PT, FR_PT. Use the following marker genes to guide labeling (higher expression in the indicated subtype vs others): PTS1: Slc5a12; PTS2: Cyp2e1; PTS3: Slc7a13; Inj_PT: Havcr1; FR_PT: Vcam1, Il34, Cd44. Then report the distribution of these PT subtypes as percentages of total PT cells. Percentages should sum to ~100%. Include any missing subtypes with 0%. Vocabulary: PTS1, PTS2, PTS3, Inj_PT, FR_PT. Return EXACTLY: <EVAL_ANSWER>{"total_cells": <integer total PT cells>, "cell_type_distribution": {"PTS1": <percentage>, "PTS2": <percentage>, "PTS3": <percentage>, "Inj_PT": <percentage>, "FR_PT": <percentage>}}</EVAL_ANSWER>
